item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Let's get together this month at The Cheesecake Factory in Providence Place Mall !!!

I've never eaten at The Cheesecake Factory - this restaurant was suggested by one of the folks at the September brunch - but EVERYONE I've mentioned it to says their food is GREAT !

This is an a-la-carte brunch, not a buffet, and it's served until 2:00 pm

You can check out their Brunch menu at www.thecheesecakefactory.com The website does not provide prices but I went to the restaurant and got a menu that has them.

If you want to know a specific price, drop me a line and I'll let you know.

Basically, the EGGS & OMELETTES section ranges in price from $6.95 for the Farm Fresh Eggs ($10.95 if you add bacon, ham or canadian bacon) to $11.95 for the Energy Breakfast.

Under the SUNDAY BRUNCH section, prices range from $5.95 for the Giant Belgian Waffle ($7.95 with chocolate chips and chantilly cream or $8.50 with strawberries, pecans and chantilly cream). The French Toast is $7.50 ($10.95 with bacon, ham or canadian bacon). The most expensive item is the Steak and Eggs for $15.95

I'm really looking forward to our next get-together. Hope to see you there.

Please RSVP by Saturday 10/18 at 3:00 pm. If there are more than 7 people, I can make a reservation for us.
item.name: October brunch - Cheesecake Factory
